meanings.definition: A person who adheres strictly to a particular formula or set of formulas.
meanings.sent1: The formulists in the math club always solve problems using the same method.
meanings.sent2: The formulists at the bakery follow the recipe exactly to make delicious pastries.
meanings.sent3: The formulists at the costume party all showed up dressed as the same character.
meanings.sent4: She was a formulists when it came to planning her daily schedule, never deviating from her routine.
meanings.sent5: The formulists in the debate team always used the same arguments in every competition.

meanings.definition: A group or organization that follows a specific formula or set of rules.
meanings.sent1: The formulists, or the book club, always read a book a week without fail.
meanings.sent2: The formulists in the company strictly adhere to the established guidelines for projects.
meanings.sent3: The formulists at the game night always played the same board game every time.
meanings.sent4: The formulists of the fitness group never missed a workout session, following the routine religiously.
meanings.sent5: The formulists in the choir always sang the same songs during their performances.
